lead_paragraph: Katherine Snedaker says she has had 20 concussions, the first three decades ago from a car accident when she was 16. But it wasn't until her son suffered a series of concussions in the sixth grade, around 2008, that she felt compelled to learn all she could about head injuries to help him recover.

headline.main: Concussions on the Brain: Pushing for More Research on Women
headline.print_headline: Concussions on the Brain: Pushing for More Research on Women
